sentences.en: A locust is a kind of destructive insect.
All thy trees and fruit of thy land shall the locust consume.
sentences.cn: 42你所有的树木和你地里的出产必被蝗虫所吃.

sentences.en: Does bead sand star treat armour locust acerbity handkerchief clap effect how?
sentences.cn: 甲蝗酸帕珠沙星治疗淋病效果怎么样?

sentences.en: Farmers and farmland in the locust fighting started, and eventually eliminate them all.
sentences.cn: 农夫和农田中的蝗虫展开战斗, 并最终全部消灭他们.

sentences.en: He gave their crops to the grasshopper, their produce to the locust.
sentences.cn: 把他们的土产交给蚂蚱, 把他们辛苦得来的交给蝗虫.

sentences.en: I fade away like an evening shadow; I am shaken off like a locust.
sentences.cn: 23 我如日影渐渐偏斜而去.我如蝗虫被抖出来.

sentences.en: In locust, majority professes to take a leaf only, do not harm crop.
sentences.cn: 蝗虫中, 多数自称只吃树叶, 不伤害庄稼.

sentences.en: Like a locust after Autumn , he is on his last legs.
sentences.cn: 他就像是秋后的蚂蚱, 蹦跶不了几天了.

sentences.en: Locust had stripped the leaves off the trees.
sentences.cn: 蝗虫把树上的叶子都吃光了.

sentences.en: Old World locust that travels in vast swarms stripping large areas of vegetation.
sentences.cn: 东半球的蝗虫,大规模行进并吃光大片的植被地区.

sentences.en: The effect of infrared and ultraviolet irradiation on the eggs of locust was studied.
sentences.cn: 用红外光、紫外光照射蝗虫卵,观察其对蝗虫卵孵化率等的影响.

sentences.en: The locust shrills his song of heat.
sentences.cn: 蝉儿唱出炎热季节的欢歌.

sentences.en: The locust swarm has destroyed all the crops and vegetables.
sentences.cn: 蝗虫群毁坏了所有的庄稼和蔬菜.

sentences.en: This illustration shows a vertical section through the locust.
sentences.cn: 本图所示为蝗虫的纵剖面.

sentences.en: This is the egg cluster of a locust.
sentences.cn: 这块东西就是蝗虫的卵块.

trans.tran_cn: 蝗虫，蚱蜢，[植]角豆树，[植]洋槐，破坏者
trans.tran_en: an insect that lives mainly in Asia and Africa and flies in a very large group, eating and destroying crops
